response.original_title: The Beatles’ “A Hard Day’s Night” DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Experience the timeless magic of The Beatles’ third studio album, “A Hard Day’s Night,” like never before with DTS-HD Master Audio. Released in 1964, this iconic album features all original songs penned by the legendary duo John Lennon and Paul McCartney. The album includes unforgettable tracks like “Can’t Buy Me Love” and the title track “A Hard Day’s Night,” both of which topped charts across the globe1.  With DTS-HD MA, every note, chord, and harmony is delivered with unparalleled clarity and depth, bringing you closer to the raw energy and creativity of The Beatles. This high-definition audio format ensures that the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques are preserved in stunning detail.
response.title: The Beatles’ “A Hard Day’s Night” DTS-HD MA
